thread.title: Justin Bieber's Instagram Return Is Finally Popping Off - Bieber Posts New Shirtless Pics
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber's Instagram Return Is Finally Popping Off - Bieber Posts New Shirtless Pics

author: Peggy Truong
title: Justin Bieber's Instagram Return Is Finally Popping Off - Bieber Posts New Shirtless Pics
text: Feb 8, 2017 at 4:11pm PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Feb. 3, 2017, was a blessed day for Beliebers around the world. For starters, it was Friday (or FriYAY, as the cool kids say). It was also the day Justin Drew Bieber decided to reactivate his Instagram account after signing off because of the online hate his then-girlfriend Sofia Richie received last year . TBH, Justin’s return wasn’t initially all that exciting because his first post in nearly six months was his Super Bowl commercial for T-Mobile . There was no official "It's good to be back" or "Missed my Beliebers" message. Just Bieber imitating the old man from the Six Flags commercial: A video posted by Justin Bieber (@justinbieber) on Feb 3, 2017 at 2:07pm PST But on Wednesday, Justin was finally back to his ol' self, posting 12 lovely items from his camera roll. There were two selfies, including one of the shirtless variety: A photo posted by Justin Bieber (@justinbieber) on Feb 8, 2017 at 4:17pm PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
